recommended_actions: Prepare inpatient capacity for approximately 1 beds for dengue patients. Coordinate with the blood bank to ensure around 0 blood/platelet units are available for dengue-related needs. Enhance triage and early warning at OPD/emergency units with clear pathways for severe case transfer.

Intensify vector control (fogging, source reduction) in high-risk GN divisions in Anuradhapura. Strengthen community awareness (schools, workplaces, media) with targeted dengue prevention messages. Alert PHI and MOH teams to increase field inspections and case follow-up. Activate or reinforce the district dengue emergency response plan and hold frequent situation review meetings. Prepare inpatient capacity for approximately 1 beds for dengue patients. Coordinate with the blood bank to ensure around 0 blood/platelet units are available for dengue-related needs. Enhance triage and early warning at OPD/emergency units with clear pathways for severe case transfer.
